item.title: By: FI
item.dc:creator: FI
item.description: <p>I must be married to a practical saint but at least I'm just in the top half, apparently 48% are purer than me!</p>
item.content:encoded: I must be married to a practical saint but at least I’m just in the top half, apparently 48% are purer than me!

item.title: By: matt
item.dc:creator: matt
item.description: <p>you are saintly compared to my quote of £16,383</p>
item.content:encoded: you are saintly compared to my quote of £16,383

item.title: By: Simon
item.dc:creator: Simon
item.description: <p>My soul is only worth £29,212 according to this site - it must be my answer about watching Sky tv that's brought my self-worth down!</p>
item.content:encoded: My soul is only worth £29,212 according to this site – it must be my answer about watching Sky tv that’s brought my self-worth down!
